definition: Entities qualifying as medium-sized+ enterprises operating in high-criticality sectors (Annex I) or identified as critical entities under CER Directive 2022/2557
key_obligations: Implement Article 21 measures, report incidents (Article 23), approve measures via management body (Article 20)

definition: Entities qualifying as medium-sized+ enterprises operating in other critical sectors (Annex II)
key_obligations: Implement Article 21 measures, report incidents (Article 23), approve measures via management body (Article 20)

definition: EU Member States responsible for transposition enforcement and coordination
key_obligations: Adopt national cybersecurity strategy, designate CSIRTs/competent authorities/single points of contact, submit entity lists

definition: National entity responsible for incident handling vulnerability coordination and operational cooperation
key_obligations: Receive incident notifications, provide assistance, coordinate vulnerability disclosure, participate in CSIRTs network

definition: National authority responsible for cybersecurity supervision and enforcement
key_obligations: Supervise entities, conduct audits/inspections, issue binding instructions, impose administrative fines

definition: National liaison for cross-border cooperation on cybersecurity
key_obligations: Forward cross-border incident notifications, coordinate with other Member States' single points of contact

definition: Entity's governing body responsible for cybersecurity governance (board of directors executives)
key_obligations: Approve cybersecurity risk-management measures, oversee implementation, participate in cybersecurity training

definition: Union agency providing cybersecurity expertise maintaining vulnerability database supporting Member States
key_obligations: Maintain European vulnerability database, provide guidelines/templates, support Cooperation Group/CSIRTs network, maintain entity registry

definition: Strategic cooperation forum at Union level with Member State representatives
key_obligations: Strategic cooperation, information exchange, policy guidelines, coordinated supply chain risk assessments, peer reviews

type_name: EU-CyCLONe (European Cyber Crisis Liaison Organisation Network)
definition: Network for large-scale cybersecurity incident/crisis coordination
key_obligations: Coordinate response to large-scale incidents/crises, link technical and political levels, impact analysis
